Bill Burke wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> Why not send back a particular error representation format with your 403
> response?
> ...

Such as in 
<http://greenbytes.de/tech/webdav/rfc4918.html#rfc.section.16>... Note 
that the response could be sent with an XSLT PI, so browers could still 
display something meaningful

BR, Julian
